metadata.title: Lighthouse Temperature and Salinity Data
metadata.description: This data set contains daily seawater surface temperatures and salinities from up to 14 lighthouse stations along the British Columbia coast since 1914.
keywords: North Inner Coast (QCS, Hecate, Dixon Inlet and passages)
South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Supports scientific and environmental research.

Supplemental Information: Custom software is available for use with this dataset.

Status: In Work

Maintenance frequency: Daily

Access constraints: Public

Use constraints: None
